column2: "Rest assured, Master Gettemhart is somewhere else as at the moment."
"However, I have one question. Is it so unusual for me to be by myself?"
"I was asked by another ARKS. They said it was dangerous to be alone."
"At that time I didn't think about it much, but..."
"Is being alone such an usual thing?"
"Even when in a group there are plenty of times when others will not help you."
"Sorry for wasting your time. Excuse me."
